actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, as amended, to permit air carriers to hold both scheduled and supplemental certificates of public convenience and necessity.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit air carriers to hold both scheduled and supplemental certificates of public convenience and necessity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, as amended, to permit air carriers to hold both scheduled and supplemental certificates of public convenience and necessity.
